column4: I want to installed a simple application xawtv but it does not show in the pacakge list, what should I do ?
anyone ?
this is boring
I hav ebeen trying to make this app myself, every thing goes well but the cmnd does not install
it's in universe, as you see ^^^
what is universe ?
read ubotu's URLs above
erm ---
excuse to be a pain , erm ??
there are two links the bot spat out above
read those links
http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/AddingRepositoriesHowto is the first
almost anything is in the repositories...
for a full complement of packages, enable multiverse and universe, reload - then use synaptic
did you read the link?
the repositories are the URLs where the packages of software are stored, if you like
synaptic allows you to automatically install from them
you just update the list of available packages by reloading, then choose what you want and select it for installation
it's that simple
ok thanks, but this did not make my webcam to work
heh - ubotu is the channel's bot
